typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{ MeterSerialNo} as string,
		{ Material} as string,
		{ Manufacturer} as string,
		{ MeterType} as string,
		YearOfManufacture as string,
		YearOfCertification as string,
		MonthOfManufacture as string,
		CreationDate as string,
		ModernType as string,
		IMSI as string,
		IMEI as string,
		ICCID as string,
		FirmwareVer as string,
		ConfigurationVer as string,
		Status as string,
		Seed as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
